By train to Schaan-Vaduz station (trains only run at certain times of the day), or by Liechtenstein bus (Schaan Bahnhof, i.e. the railway station, is an interchange point for all the bus routes). If you're driving, take the exit Buchs on the Swiss motorway A13 and cross the Rhine river into Liechtenstein and Schaan.
You can get around by foot in the center.

Nightlife in Schaan consists of pubs, bars frequented by locals (including a sports bar) and nightclubs.

One of the most interesting and exciting bars in Schaan can be found on Bahnhofstrasse:

. It's got a unique atmosphere with several pool tables and arcades, and serves excellent local and foreign beer - not to forget the infamous "Jägermeister-machine". It's a bar that shows live football, tennis and all other sports. Before heading home make sure you enjoy one of the infamous "Fleischkäs-Brötle" at Rhomberg's Bäckerei aka Didi's Wurststullen, which is located across the street.

value: content=Nice rooms. centrally located. Good prices for Liechtenstein.
address=across from Schaan's Post Office/Bus Station/Train Station
content= Acceptable rooms.  Good prices for Liechtenstein.
